product_description: brown men wallet with two sections and a name tag in front right bottom corner with silver boundary.

copy_data.primary_copy: Elevate your everyday carry with our sleek brown leather wallet. Personalized style meets smart organization.
copy_data.headline: Your Signature Style, Perfectly Organized
copy_data.description: Premium brown leather bifold with customizable name tag and silver accents. Two organized sections keep cards and cash perfectly sorted for the modern gentleman.

claude_optimized_prompt: Professional product photography of a rich brown leather wallet with silver trim on wooden desk, soft natural lighting from window, coffee cup and laptop blurred in background, minimalist modern office setting, cinematic depth of field, top-down 45-degree angle, rule of thirds composition, 8K quality

image_generation_result.revised_prompt: Professional product photography of a rich brown leather wallet with silver trim placed on a wooden desk. The setting features soft, natural lighting coming from a window. In the blurred background, there's a coffee cup and a laptop to suggest a minimalist modern office setting. The image showcases cinematic depth of field, captured from a top-down 45-degree angle using the rule of thirds composition. Rendered in 8K quality, the image highlights the wallet's elegant craftsmanship.
image_generation_result.original_prompt: Professional product photography of a rich brown leather wallet with silver trim on wooden desk, soft natural lighting from window, coffee cup and laptop blurred in background, minimalist modern office setting, cinematic depth of field, top-down 45-degree angle, rule of thirds composition, 8K quality
